summary:
HEY THE LAST JEDI TEASER DROPPED APRIL 14, 2017, SO EPISODE IX TEASER ANY DAY NOW??????? 

or will be one of the trailers before...
title:
HEY THE LAST JEDI TEASER DROPPED APRIL 14, 2017, SO EPISODE IX TEASER ANY DAY NOW??????? 

or will be one of the trailers before Endgame.
body: lol but just imagine sitting in the theater and BOOM Star Wars without warning then BOOM Endgame

blog.name: ao3feed--reylo
blog.title: Reylo AO3 Feed
blog.description:
This blog automatically posts links to AO3 fics containing the Rey/Kylo Ren tag.
Avatar by @panda-capuccino

title: Pressed
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2OCBjZv

by Minkel23

He sweeps Rey into his arms, carrying her down the stairs and into his home. He lays her on his bed, hovering ever-so-slightly above her while he peels his shirt from his skin.

It’s Rey who pushes up, or maybe Ben who looks down.

Whoever is at fault, their lips meet. The kiss is chaste. The kiss is long. The kiss lingers long after they fall asleep, wrapped in each other’s arms.

But it is a kiss loaded with promise, and the first kiss Rey has ever had that makes her blood run hot and her heart run fast.

‘This is my bed,’ she tells him. She wraps her arms further around his body. ‘And this is where you sleep from this moment on.’

He nods, kissing her once more, the brush of his tongue into her mouth making her moan in delight.

They can’t pretend at night.

Words: 2219, Chapters: 1/20, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars Sequel Trilogy
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Ben Solo, Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Kylo Ren, Rey (Star Wars), Leia Organa, Armitage Hux, Poe Dameron, Snoke (Star Wars)
  • Relationships: Kylo Ren/Rey, Rey/Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Rey & Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Rey/Ben Solo, Rey & Ben Solo, Poe Dameron/Armitage Hux
  • Additional Tags: flashbacks aplenty, Rey is a journalist, kylo is a journalist, casablanca vibes, poe and Hux are my favourite ship, snoke is Rupert murdoch, theyll always have paris, Divorce, reunion romance, definitely a HEA


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2OCBjZv

title: Pressed
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2OCBjZv

by Minkel23

He sweeps Rey into his arms, carrying her down the stairs and into his home. He lays her on his bed, hovering ever-so-slightly above her while he peels his shirt from his skin.

It’s Rey who pushes up, or maybe Ben who looks down.

Whoever is at fault, their lips meet. The kiss is chaste. The kiss is long. The kiss lingers long after they fall asleep, wrapped in each other’s arms.

But it is a kiss loaded with promise, and the first kiss Rey has ever had that makes her blood run hot and her heart run fast.

‘This is my bed,’ she tells him. She wraps her arms further around his body. ‘And this is where you sleep from this moment on.’

He nods, kissing her once more, the brush of his tongue into her mouth making her moan in delight.

They can’t pretend at night.

He sweeps Rey into his arms, carrying her down the stairs and into his home. He lays her on his bed, hovering ever-so-slightly above her while he peels his shirt from his skin.

It’s Rey who pushes up, or maybe Ben who looks down.

Whoever is at fault, their lips meet. The kiss is chaste. The kiss is long. The kiss lingers long after they fall asleep, wrapped in each other’s arms.

But it is a kiss loaded with promise, and the first kiss Rey has ever had that makes her blood run hot and her heart run fast.

‘This is my bed,’ she tells him. She wraps her arms further around his body. ‘And this is where you sleep from this moment on.’

He nods, kissing her once more, the brush of his tongue into her mouth making her moan in delight.

They can’t pretend at night.

Words: 5580, Chapters: 1/20, Language: English

  • Relationships: Kylo Ren/Rey, Rey/Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Rey & Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Rey/Ben Solo, Rey & Ben Solo, Poe Dameron/Armitage Hux

summary:
Star Wars Episode IX Three Armies Theory 
Army 1: Rey & The Resistance
Army 2: Kylo Ren, Knights of Ren, Stormtroopers loyal to...
body:
Star Wars Episode IX Three Armies Theory

Army 1: Rey & The Resistance

Army 2: Kylo Ren, Knights of Ren, Stormtroopers loyal to Kylo/ Liberated(?) Stormtroopers

(I would go as far as to say Kylo Ren & The Knights of Ren are a separate entity, seeing how Kylo’s lightsaber and the Millenium Falcon’s trail creates a “V” separating them from both the Resistance and the First Order)

Army 3: First Order under Hux/Richard E Grant’s Character /Threat from “Beyond”

We also see the Resistance in the white portion of the poster and the First Order in the black portion, suggesting a clear cut “Good and Evil” scenario, but Kylo Ren and his Knights are smack-dab in the center of the piece, equally in the Light and the Dark.

Anyone?

@glitzescape @bellaren18 @michellestarswept @lilyevansreyjakuu @darcyfitz @ajedisgirl @empressdarkren @welsharcher @clairen45 @pacificwanderer @toawaterfowl @akylodarkly83 @fluffycakesistainted @mummiesandlightsabers @vespaer77 @princeofdarkness15 @galatians-4-6 @shaara-2

blog.name: dailypronounpractice
blog.title: Daily Pronoun Practice & Validation

mod: alex - nonbinary - (they/them, she/her)

trans positivity, non-binary friendly - featuring pronoun validations, positivity, and practice eg. texts with pronouns replaced (see tag #daily pronoun swap).

requests welcome

summary: today’s #dailypronounswap - Rogue One: A Star Wars Story by Alexander Freed ft. Jyn + xe/xem pronouns got an idea for...
body:
today’s #dailypronounswap - Rogue One: A Star Wars Story by Alexander Freed ft. Jyn + xe/xem pronouns

got an idea for dailypronounswap? requests welcome

Jyn wasn’t a bad person. Jyn didn’t like to misbehave. When xir parents told xem to do something, xe almost always did it. Not fast, but eventually (almost always eventually). Xe didn’t deserve to be punished.

Xe knew xe shouldn’t have stayed to watch xir mother talk to Papa and the man in white. But xe couldn’t have known what would happen. Xe couldn’t have known what the troopers would do…

Had they been talking about xir? Was it xir fault?

Mama wasn’t moving. Papa held her in his arms. Jyn couldn’t stop xemself from crying, but xe held back a scream because xe had to be brave. Xe had to be.

Xe’d seen how scared Mama had been. Whoever the strangers were, Jyn knew they would hurt xem, too.

And xe knew what xe was supposed to do. Xe needed to behave now. Xe needed to make things better.

Xe had trouble breathing as xe ran. Xir nose and eyes streamed and xir throat felt swollen and clogged. Xe heard voices in the distance, electronic voices like droids or garbled comms. The troopers were coming after xem.

summary:
Obi-Wan: Are you sure you made the right choice?
Qui-Gon: I don't make mistakes, Obi-Wan. I do crosswords with sharpies and...
body:
Obi-Wan: Are you sure you made the right choice?
Qui-Gon: I don't make mistakes, Obi-Wan. I do crosswords with sharpies and never learned the shortcut for undo.
Obi-Wan: It's ctrl z.
Qui-Gon: Don't need it. Won't use it.

blog.name: mandowords
blog.title: Miit'alor
blog.description: I am a descriptivist linguist for the Mando'a language. I show what it can do, not what it MUST do. This is a place for discussion about Mando'a, and Mandalorian society and culture. Feel free to use the head cannons from this blog (or reblogged from others) in your RP or writing. All words and descriptions are taken from the mandoa.org Mandalorian Dictionary. Want to support this blog? Buy me a Kofi? OR buy some Mando'a themed items? Visit our Discord? Blog icon by Rina

summary: LEGO da transformação do Darth Vader
title: LEGO da transformação do Darth Vader
body:
LEGO da transformação do Darth Vader

O LEGO da transformação do Darth Vader é um dos lançamentos recentes da empresa que leva a marca da saga Star Wars.

Desta vez, o foco vai para quando Anakin Skywalker, todo queimado e ferrado, é reconstruído por máquinas e finalmente se torna aquele ser obscuro que todo mundo conhece como Lorde Vader.

Este kit vem com três minifiguras do personagem, em diferentes estágios de transformação,…

title: #MakeKyloBaldo for Episode IX
body:
Contributor @swarzseawalker makes his case for why the filmmakers of Episode IX should #MakeKyloBaldo and how it might just bring peace to the galaxy

Image courtesy of The Art of Star Wars: The Last Jedi by Phil Szostak

There’s a lot of anticipation going into Star Wars Episode IX. The Last Jedihas apparently divided the fandom, but there is one thing the filmmakers could do to create a wonderful, uplifting, and inspirational film that will unite audiences everywhere: Make Kylo Ren Bald. Or, as it is known by its adoring fans on social media,…

View On WordPress
